name: Skull Crusher Mace, 85cm
description: The Skull Crusher is a latex and foam mace for LARP and Cosplay. A good handle and a soft head makes this mace an excellent combination of speed, reach and ferocity.

name: Giant War Mallet, 101cm
description: This giant war mallet looks as if you are toting around a giant log on a stick, but oh what damage can it cause. This larp safe giant latex mallet looks like the real thing, but is able to deliver a blow without the fear of harm. Trolls beware!

name: Giant Stone Hammer, 105cm
description: Lay waste and create panic with this ultra-safe Larp Stone Hammer. Every larp character can appreciate seeing fear in your opponents eyes as you swing this giant stone hammer. Being larp safe does not mean we have to make small weapons!

name: King Mace, 105cm
description: The King Mace is a massive, 105cm long latex and foam mace for Cosplay and LARP. It sports a leather handle and a wide, awe-inspiring spiked head. It's worthy of a Dwarven King!

name: Wood Mallet, 40cm
description: The foam and latex Mallet is a wooden warhammer ideal for LARP and Cosplay. Its looks like a weapon a carpenter or a peasant would use.

name: Bar Mace, 70cm
description: The foam %26 latex Bar Mace is a LARP and Cosplay weapon­. Its made of two steel bars welded and studded together. This mace will fit for medieval or apocalyptic settings.

name: Footman Mace, 80cm
description: The footman’s foam %26 latex mace is a weapon for LARP and Cosplay. It's lightweight, balanced and capable of bludgeoning any enemies. Clerics, priests %26 paladins will love it.

name: Warhammer, 85cm
description: This Warhammer in foam and latex has been specifically designed for LARP and Cosplay in mind. It's 85 cm long, fairly light, and has a nice brutal steel finish.

name: Guardian Hammer, 85cm
description: The guardian hammer is a latex and foam 85cm long warhammer for LARP and Cosplay. It has a flat, stout head and imbedded gemstones and gold trim.

name: Imperial Mace, 85cm
description: The imperial foam latex mace is a LARP and Cosplay weapon. It's a blackened steel flanged mace designed to crush brutally your enemies. It's a deceptively light and fast weapon.

name: Demon Slayer Mace, 80cm
description: Demon Slayer Mace in foam and latex is a great choice for LARP and Cosplay. Its lightweight confection makes it perfect for Cleric, priests and paladin characters.

name: Sun Hammer, 140cm
description: The battle had been finally won. The days of wielding the great Sun Hammer has done its duty, but the war between the great Dwarven Kings is far from over. For now, there are far more menacing goblins to take care of in the caverns below.
